introduction: 《金童》讲述的是詹姆斯的故事，他是一个年轻人，他赌被人看到的危险与绝望和隐身的平静生活。从注定的不存在中拯救了CQ，一个富有的、风度翩翩的商人，有着更多的进展，而不是符合眼睛，并介绍给一个世界，他还没有准备好导航。当他追逐梦想时，我们跟着他——同时迷失自己，一次一片。《金童》是一个主题广泛的故事。信任。诱惑。背叛。救赎。GOLDEN BOY is the story of James, a young man who gambles on the dangers of being seen versus the quiet life of desperation and invisibility. Saved from doomed nonexistence by CQ, a wealthy debonair businessman with more going on than meets the eye, and introduced to a world he is not ready to navigate. We follow him as he chases his dreams -- while losing himself, one piece at a time. GOLDEN BOY is a story with universal themes. Trust. Seduction. Betrayal. Redemption.
